summary: Jedná se o ceský preklad modu Inns and Taverns autora Mena. Archiv obsahuje pouze .esp soubor. Pro správnou funkci modu je zapotrebí stáhnout si puvodní mod odtud http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28283/?
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=200][color=red][b]CZECH TRANSLATION[/b][/color][/size][/center]

Jedna se o cesky preklad modu: [b]Inns and Taverns[/b]
Autor: [b]Mena[/b]
Puvodní mod stazitelny z: [b]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28283/?[/b] nebo [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28283/?][b]PRIMY ODKAZ / DIRECT LINK[/b][/url]

[color=yellow]Archiv obsahuje pouze .esm a/nebo .esp soubor(y). Pro spravnou funkci modu je zapotrebi stahnout si puvodni mod.[/color]


Další poděkování / Additional Credits
-----------------------------------------------------
[b]McGuffin[/b] za vytvoření TesVTranslatoru / for creating TesVTranslator

Author of the english mod also wishes to thank to:
------------------------------------------------------------------------
LilaMue for her Silver Cutlery resource.
runsbuns for the idea of custom wines/dishes for the inns
Xubarku for help in making this mod compatible with Perseid's Inns and Taverns, and numerous other suggestions.
ZeroSaber39 for reminding me to put lights outside.
The Gimp for existing.
Nifskope, also for existing.
Multiple online sources for patterns/images/tutorials used in making the various inn signs and other textures used in this mod.
Bethesda for making Skyrim and the Creation Kit, without which this mod would not be possible.
author: Azarian
